Package org.sakaiproject.content.tool

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttachmentAction
    AttachmentAction is a helper Action that other tools can use to edit their attachments.
    BasicRightsAssignment
    BasicRightsAssignment can be used to represent a copyright or CreativeCommons designation for a resource.
    BasicRightsAssignment.RightsOption  
    EntityCounter
    EntityCounter
    FilePickerAction
    The FilePickerAction drives the FilePicker helper.
    FilePickerAction.AttachItem
    AttachItem
    ListItem
    ListItem This class is for displaying a ContentEntity in the user interface.
    MetadataGroup
    class encapsulates information about groups of metadata tags (such as DC, LOM, etc.)
    ResourceConditionsHelper  
    ResourcesAction
    ResourceAction is a ContentHosting application
    ResourcesAction.Action
    Action
    ResourcesAction.ChefPathItem
    Inner class encapsulates information about folders (and final item?)
    ResourcesAction.ElementCarrier  
    ResourcesBrowseItem
    Internal class that encapsulates all information about a resource that is needed in the browse mode.
    ResourcesEditItem
    Inner class encapsulates information about resources (folders and items) for editing This is being phased out as we switch to the resources type registry.
    ResourcesHelperAction  
    ResourcesItem  
    ResourcesMetadata
    The class represents metadata properties.
    ResourceTypeLabeler
